parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to sort by. Available fields: `elbow_plot`, `image`, `clustered_image`, `rgb_colours`, `hex_colours`, `num_clusters`, `updated_at`, `created_at`. Prefix a field by `-` to reverse the sort order. For example `foo,-bar` sorts by `foo` in ascending order then by `bar` in descending order.

parameters.name: filter[elbow_plot][contains]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `elbow_plot` attribute contains the given value as a substring (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: filter[image][contains]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `image` attribute contains the given value as a substring (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: filter[clustered_image][contains]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `clustered_image` attribute contains the given value as a substring (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: filter[rgb_colours][contains]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `rgb_colours` attribute contains the given value as a substring (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: filter[hex_colours][contains]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `hex_colours` attribute contains the given value as a substring (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: filter[num_clusters][lt]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `num_clusters` attribute is strictly less than the given value.

parameters.name: filter[num_clusters][lte]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `num_clusters` attribute is less than or equal to the given value.

parameters.name: filter[num_clusters][gt]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `num_clusters` attribute is strictly greater than the given value.

parameters.name: filter[num_clusters][gte]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `num_clusters` attribute is greater than or equal to the given value.

parameters.name: filter[created_at][lt]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `created_at` attribute is strictly less than the given value.

parameters.name: filter[created_at][lte]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `created_at` attribute is less than or equal to the given value.

parameters.name: filter[created_at][gt]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `created_at` attribute is strictly greater than the given value.

parameters.name: filter[created_at][gte]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `created_at` attribute is greater than or equal to the given value.

parameters.name: filter[updated_at][lt]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `updated_at` attribute is strictly less than the given value.

parameters.name: filter[updated_at][lte]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `updated_at` attribute is less than or equal to the given value.

parameters.name: filter[updated_at][gt]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `updated_at` attribute is strictly greater than the given value.

parameters.name: filter[updated_at][gte]
parameters.description: Causes the response to include only records whose `updated_at` attribute is greater than or equal to the given value.
